message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is too low for me to consider. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it's worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?

I understand that the product has value, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $13,500. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your willingness to negotiate.  I see you're serious about the product.  While $13,500 is closer, I can't accept anything less than $16,000. I'm confident this is a fair price that reflects its true value.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $15,500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. This is my final offer.
